description: Yamada was taken to hospital with compound fractures in both of his hands. He has a certain "chronic illness". It`s a strange disease that causes severe pain in the testicles if he did not ejaculate once every three hours. During his stay in the hospital, he is unable to use his hands and the "treatment" must be performed by the nurses in the ward. However, this hospital turned out to be a hell, rumored to be staffed by nurses with the worst personalities! Tachibana was the first person in charge of Yamada. Upon meeting her for the first time, Yamada receives a look of disgust from her, and ends up receiving inorganic and administrative "treatment." However, to ejaculate continuously, "various stimulations" were necessary. Tachibana lashes out at Yamada and tries various methods to "treat" him. The behavior gradually escalates!
